long_description: Take a walk on the wooly side in the incredible comfort of the SmartWool PhD 2-in-1 Run Shorts. They power your workout with the smooth feel of merino wool in the liner shorts. Outer shorts offer lightweight breathability and look like a standard pair of shorts-but wait!-below the all-too-normal surface lies merino-blend liner briefs. Just as comfortable as your wool base layers yet lighter, the seamless liner wicks moisture, breathes well, and resists odors thanks to the natural properties of merino wool. Ventilation panels in high-heat zones keep things cool. Rear zippered pocket stores extras. The semifitted SmartWool PhD 2-in-1 Run Shorts feature a mid rise and reflective highlights.
